DOC.brief_summary: The study design assess bioavailability iron 4 different iron fortify savoury food product
DOC.brief_title: Bioavailability Iron From Savoury Food Product
DOC.criteria: Healthy female subject ; Age > 18 < 40 year screen ; Body weight < 65 kg ; Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement ( judge study physician ) ; With iron deficiency ( Serum ferritin < 15Âµg/L ) ; Currently smoke nonsmoker least six month report use nicotine containing product six month precede study study ; Willing able participate study ; Having give write informed consent . Blood donation significant blood loss past 6 month ; Reported use medically selfprescribed diet ; Use medication ( except oral contraceptive ) Use vitamin mineral supplement unwillingness discontinue use two week prior study study ; Is pregnant plan pregnancy study period ; Is lactate lactate 6 week prestudy investigation and/or study period ; Known gastrointestinal metabolic disorder ; Participation another clinical trial last 30 day prior begin study .
